data.event: Mogo was established during the Gold Rush after a gold find was reported in 1851.
Bimbimbie, the last gold mine in the Mogo area, closed in 1984 with the floating of the Australian dollar.

event.title: survived as a sleepy highway town, and during the 1990s

data.event: The town survived as a sleepy highway town, and during the 1990s was revitalised with the growth in regional tourism.

event.title: was successfully bred at Mogo Zoo in 1999

data.event: Although small in comparison to metropolitan zoos, Mogo Zoo is home to many exotic species, such as the red panda and the snow leopard, the latter of which was successfully bred at Mogo Zoo in 1999.
